Each donation that shows in the donation: Each donation that shows in the donation ticker will be in this format. Available tokens:
The maximum amount of donations to show: Den maksimale mængde af donationer, der vises i ticker. Skal være et tal større end 0.
How fast the ticker should scroll betwee: How fast the ticker should scroll between 1 (fastest) and 10 (slowest). Set to 0 for no scrolling.
The font size in pixels. Reasonable size: Skriftstørrelse i pixels. Størrelsen ligger typisk mellem 24px og 48px.
How thick to make the font. The value sh: How thick to make the font. The value should range between 300 (thinnest) and 900 (thickest)
